ARABIC: فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوْمِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓا۟ أَخْرِجُوٓا۟ ءَالَ لُوطٍ مِّن قَرْيَتِكُمْ إِنَّهُمْ أُنَاسٌ يَتَطَهَّرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: the only response of his people was to say: 'Drive the family of Lut out of your city! They are people who keep themselves pure!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: His people had no answer except saying: "Expel the family of Lot from your city. They are a people who would (rather) be pure!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But this had only one answer from his people. They said: "Expel Lot's folk from your city. They pretend to be absolutely clean."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: His people had no answer but to say, "Expel Lot and his family from the town for they want to be pure."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore the answer of his people was nothing except that they said, “Expel the family of Lut from your township; these people wish purity!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: There was no other answer given by his people except that they said: "Drive out the family of Lut from your city. Verily, these are men who want to be clean and pure!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But the answer of his people was no other except that they ~s said: Turn out Lut's followers from your town; surely they are a people who would keep pure!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And the only answer of his people was that they said, 'Expel the folk of Lot from your city; they are men that keep themselves clean!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But the answer of his folk was naught save that they said: Expel the household of Lot from your township, for they (forsooth) are folk who would keep clean!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The only answer of his people was, "Drive out Lot and his family from the city. They are a people who make themselves out to be pure."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then there was no answer of his people save that they said: drive forth the family of Lut from your City, verily they are a people who would be pure!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But the only answer of his people was that they said, ‘Expel Lot’s family from your town! They are indeed a puritanical lot.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But his people gave no other answer but this: they said, "Drive out the followers of Lut from your city: these are indeed men who want to be clean and pure!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: There was no other answer given by his people except that they said: "Drive out the family of Lout (Lot) from your city. Verily, these are men who want to be clean and pure!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Yet the only answer of his nation was that they said: 'Expel the family of Lot from your village, they are people who purified themselves'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But the only response of his people was to say, “Expel the family of Lot from your town. They are purist people.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But the answer of his people was not except that they said, "Expel the family of Lot from your city. Indeed, they are people who keep themselves pure."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:56] But the only response of his people was that they said, ‘Expel Lot’s family from your town. They are indeed a folk who [prefer to] remain pure!’, from [coming unto] the rears of men.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But the answer of his folk was naught save that they said: Expel the household of Lot) Lot and his two daughters: Za'ura and Raytha (from your township) Sodom, (for they (forsooth) are folk who would keep clean) they exonerate themselves from sodomy! 431
